main event: A red colored object was observed at Patrick AFB moving in a zig-zag manner on February 13, 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared larger than a star., It moved in a zig-zag and pulsating motion., There was no sound associated with the observation., The sighting lasted approximately one minute., The observation took place near the base theater during overcast conditions.
sighted object: a red colored object in the sky
